s.text: And I'm still waiting to find out what's so brave about poor Neville Longbottom, who keeps losing his pet toad, getting scolded by his grandmother, and cowering in corridors.
(This is particularly true in childhood, but I'm not over it yet--are you?)

He can hardly bring himself to turn away, and sneaks back for another fix whenever he gets the chance.
